divs: Sighting DetailsJust got back, from chico,Ca. from taking daughter to the dentist. we got home around 5;30 pm 10-24-2013. I went out back to have a cigerette. I glanced up seen to lights at first thought, 2 stars then did a double take and said to myself its to early for stars, then was thinking plane, but objects they weren't moving fast enough. so i looked for venus to see if it was out yet, did not see the planet which should be southwest from my location about 20 degrees or so off the horizon. I ran in house grabbed my binos and started looking ,it made the objects kind of blurry. couldn't get a good view thats when i called the wife out to look. She came out followed by my daughter and they looked seen the same thing thats when i grabbed the telescope 5 inch reflector on tri pod set it up had a 40mm lens in it focused on a round kind of flattend top bottom glow with red light on top almost like a round clam shell it had grooved lines in it verticly or at least like shadows. turned scope on other object to compare same but had white light on top. I watched it for about 30 mins total and through scope approx. 15 mins. they were driffting towards the east, as it got darker they just slowly faded out.
Summary: I seen two lights in the sky and thought they were stars, until i got the telescope out.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Yuba City
There were no other sightings in Yuba City on or around October 24th 2013
